subject: Your Booking Confirmation - AirAsia
content: Thank you for booking with AirAsia. Manage your trip at https://www.airasia.com

subject: Important Notice: Your account has been suspended!
content: We detected suspicious activity. Verify your account immediately by logging in at http://secure-update-paypal.com/login

subject: Meeting Reminder
content: Hi team, this is a reminder for our weekly check-in meeting tomorrow at 10 AM. No external links here.

subject: You've won an iPhone!
content: Click now to claim your prize: http://freeiphonegiveaway.ru/winner
